ValidationRule.description: If Enable_Retry__c field is checked, the fields Apex_Class_for_Retry__c, Maximum_Retries__c, and Retry_Interval__c cannot be blank.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Enable_Retry__c, OR( ISBLANK(Apex_Class_for_Retry__c), ISBLANK(Maximum_Retries__c), ISBLANK(Retry_Interval__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If Enable_Retry__c field is checked, the fields Apex_Class_for_Retry__c, Maximum_Retries__c, Retry_Interval__c, and Status_Codes_to_Retry__c cannot be blank.
